name: Probation Mental Health Program
short_desc: Case management, counseling and intervention for at-risk youth and youth on probation
description: Probation Mental Health program is in partnership with the Alameda County Probation Department and public schools. Probation Mental Health aims to assist youth to successfully complete juvenile probation or prevent them from being involved in the juvenile justice system altogether. Assists youth to attend school consistently and to identify and obtain short- and long-term life goals.SERVICES: Individual, family and group counseling, anger management groups; Trauma Awareness Groups; case management services; in home therapy as needed; crisis intervention; and collateral services.
